column5:
Unrelated but if you are a Lana stan that‚Äôs pretty awesome because it‚Äôs not everyday you find people who are fans of BTS and Lana Del Rey lol.

Also she referenced/took inspiration from David Bowie and Lolita.
Yeah crash landing on you, I was gonna say that. That girl‚Äôs bias was Jungkook haha.
if I used it for the demo do you think it's okay?
wow I kind of look like you, especially in the eyes

And this is why I don't want to tell doctors I have had anxiety issues or any mental health issues in the past. They'll just assume any physical symptoms you're experiencing are all in your head.

So stupid that they would take the risk of assuming it was just your anxiety.
Hmm that doesn't sound so bad. Thanks for the info.
Lol I was looking at the picture thinking ‚Äúhmmm that looks a lot like Katy Perry.‚Äù Then I saw her name. Must be a rare find though good job.
Taylor Swift‚Äôs Reputation.

I don‚Äôt know why but I feel too weird talking about race with my therapist. Like I‚Äôm scared to talk about it. Meanwhile I‚Äôd probably talk about other things people would probably consider more personal lol. And my therapist isn‚Äôt even white she‚Äôs Hispanic.

If you‚Äôre not ready to tell them you‚Äôre depressed/anxious, that‚Äôs totally understandable. I wish I had some magical advice for you but I would say just focus on taking care of yourself. If you‚Äôre getting caught up in guilty thoughts/feelings try to distract yourself. After all, feeling guilty won‚Äôt change what you did. You‚Äôre depressed and on top of that there‚Äôs literally a global pandemic happening; I know you‚Äôre doing the best you can. I hope you feel betterüíú

He told you to contact him when you feel that way so you‚Äôre definitely not in the wrong. And if he realized he can‚Äôt handle or doesn‚Äôt want to deal with it, he should have told you. I‚Äôm sorry your boyfriend is talking to you that way, you deserve better. Obviously I don‚Äôt know your boyfriend‚Äôs situation, but with everything happening in the world right now it‚Äôs possible he‚Äôs just lashing out due to the stress and anxiety so maybe it‚Äôs not personal?

Sounds like you are depressed. If that‚Äôs the case, don‚Äôt feel bad about it. If your friends are genuine friends, they‚Äôll understand. Maybe try focusing on talking to just one person because it helps to stay connected when you‚Äôre down. 

This reminds me how I also ghosted my friend, when the quarantine started. I haven‚Äôt said a word to her.üò¨

You got banned because shitting on white cisgender men is part of the liberal agenda. 

Lol I sound like a conservative but I‚Äôm not I‚Äôm just stating a fact. Sorry you got bannedüò¨
Same. I'm the healthiest I've been in years. But I'm sorry to everyone who's suffering right now.
I agree. That‚Äôs what I had in mind.

I‚Äôve also heard that people who are super caring and the type of people who go into nursing because they wanna help people are more prone to burnout. 

That‚Äôs interesting because I used to worry that I‚Äôm not caring enough to become a nurse, but maybe it‚Äôs a good thing to not be overly compassionate?
Thanks! I think it‚Äôs too late at this point to switch to Harpur though. Also I was accepted to a different nursing school and I‚Äôd rather go there.
Oh cool. Didn‚Äôt know that thanks.
Lol the comment above yours is like ‚Äúdon‚Äôt go into nursing for the pay check.‚Äù I guess it‚Äôs different for every person.

Well yeah of course. But their physical features are so distinctive from East Asians and south East Asians so they aren‚Äôt really viewed in the same way as other Asians. Of course they are part of the ‚ÄúAsians are smart‚Äù stereotype though. Race is a social construct at the end of the day so if people don‚Äôt think of Indians as Asians I think it is what it is.
I guess it‚Äôs not a popular opinion but I think you look totally white. Maybe Hispanic. I guess your nose looks kind of Asian though?
um if you are talking about me...I'm a girl and I'm also straight and I wasn't trying to imply any of those things?
True. I mean I guess my concern is that it might encourage men to continue to objectify women and believe that the only value of women is their bodies.
Oof I didn't even think about that.  I guess what I have in mind is like when Miley Cyrus twerked on stage or Nicki Minaj's Anaconda video, something like that.
You look racially ambiguous. I'm in the same boat. It's kind of cool 'cause I can potentially pass as Asian, Hispanic, Middle Eastern, maybe white (to POCs).
Yeah NYC. To be clear I was never planning to go outside, except for going on a walk or the supermarket but even then I'm worried.

I don't have any magical advice but I think you should stop watching the news or delete the news app on your phone if the coronavirus is causing you this kind of turmoil. Although the coronavirus is definitely very serious, keep in mind that the media feeds off of people's fears so they like to be ultra dramatic. Also you're still in your twenties. You have a lot of time to find someone even if the coronavirus lasts longer than we expect. Not that you should ever kill yourself, but at least wait it out for several months cause we don't know what's going to happen.

Well, the guarantee of being in the nursing school is a huge deal for me. Not having to worry about getting into nursing school takes a lot of stress away. And Stony Brook's nursing is super competitive, and tbh I'm not exactly the best student.
I feel you. Like normal people will never understand how fucking happy I‚Äôm gonna be if they cancel my high school graduation.
Lmao I don‚Äôt think you have to worry about that since none of them are voting anyway

True. I used to be like that too. I used to be a straight A student, anything less felt unacceptable, but then I crashed, everything fell apart and I was forced to re-evaluate my values and beliefs. I‚Äôve mostly deconstructed my perfectionism but in affects me in little ways  (like mindfulness). It‚Äôs subtle but still damaging.

I‚Äôm not actually trying to ‚Äúget an A in mindfulness‚Äù but you‚Äôre right that I probably do feel that way on some subconscious level. It‚Äôs a really deep seated belief though, I‚Äôm still working on completely getting rid of it.
Jesus, you can feel the pain in her voice. I‚Äôm so sorry the Chinese people have to be under this kind of regime. We Americans are really lucky.

This is so true. I am racially ambiguous as well and while we are still categorized as  ‚Äúother‚Äù I think we have an advantage in the sense that people can‚Äôt say racist things to us if they don‚Äôt know what the fuck we are.
Lol it‚Äôs true. I was watching the show 911 and I like the diversity but at the same time you could really tell they‚Äôre trying soooo hard so it was a little cringy tbh.

Yeah it‚Äôs kinda true. I personally don‚Äôt want kids either, in fact I really really hate them.

But anyways, the problem with that sub is that some people there are really hating on people who choose to have kids. Like the sub is supposed to be about supporting people who don‚Äôt want kids, but that doesn‚Äôt mean we have to put down people who want kids. 

I think that the hatred for non child free people just comes from the anger and frustration people deal with due to societal expectations. Of course that doesn‚Äôt make it right but I do understand where they‚Äôre coming from.

Not unpopular. Even though there is a surge in racism against Asians right now, many people seem to be focused on how Asians are racist, as if that means Asians deserve it. And I‚Äôm sure many people receiving racist attacks are not racist themselves. 

And yes, all Asians knows that Asians can be very racist. But please don‚Äôt assume all of us are racist. And don‚Äôt underestimate how racist other POCs can be.

Cool! Are people at the nursing school really competitive? 

Also non-nursing related but, what do people do and where do people go if they wanna go /hang out outside? Is it mostly limited to the university heights area?
I used to think I was white passing too and when I realized I‚Äôm not I didn‚Äôt take it well. Glad you are happy about it though.
All the damn time. But I also have social anxiety.
Oh shit! I almost forgot about that

Woah. Slow down. Breathe. All you need to do right now is focus on getting through the day. You don‚Äôt have to do anything. You don‚Äôt have to do homework or pay attention in class or talk to people or do chores. Because at this point every day you don‚Äôt kill yourself is a huge accomplishment. Two years ago I tried to kill myself. It was really painful. And surviving it was awful. But I‚Äôm doing much better now, although I‚Äôm still a work in progress. Hang in there, I know you got this.
I literally just did a presentation! I didn‚Äôt make a fool of myself but I feel like it wasn‚Äôt good. But I get prescribed propanolol for stuff like this. I highly recommend it.
Same. I agree with many of the liberal views about race and racism but cultural appropriation is one that just don‚Äôt make sense to me.

I‚Äôve always wanted to do the braided hairstyle that black people do, but I‚Äôm not black so I‚Äôm probably never gonna try it. Not worth all the people who are gonna call me racist. But anyway, black hairstyles are actually so cool and beautiful and I‚Äôm so sorry that black people have been/are made to feel like their hair is ‚Äúunprofessional‚Äù and whatnot.
I appreciate your advice and thanks for telling me about your background!
I‚Äôm glad this is getting attention. People only focus on how Asians are racist to blacks and while this is very true, people need to realize it‚Äôs not a one way street!

I‚Äôm 17 and I‚Äôve always known that I don‚Äôt want to be married or have kids. For me the idea of marriage/kids feels just as wrong as how a gay guy would feel if he slept with a woman (only analogy I can think of lol). It just feels really wrong, and people will never understand that.

Can‚Äôt wait for all the BS I‚Äôll have to deal with in the future.

This is probably a really dumb idea but maybe you can trying telling doctors you‚Äôre gay and that your ‚Äúwife‚Äù will have a child idk.

Thank you! This is really helpful, I really appreciate this. It‚Äôs good to hear that you were able to overcome your internalized racism. Most Asians around me aren‚Äôt proud of being Asian either and that‚Äôs been pretty discouraging.
Thanks! Yeah I‚Äôm really in need of some Asian role models.
Grass is always greener I guess
Well, I love that you love being mixed! Some people think I‚Äôm Hispanic too lol.
Any kind of advice is helpful, thanks!
Yeah, I totally agree. I do wish there was more unity amongst minorities, but I think that would be difficult to accomplish.
This is really sad. I myself live in NY, it‚Äôs really scary to see this kind of influx in racism even in places with a lot of Asians.
I‚Äôm 17, but I‚Äôll be 18 in time for the election (vs Trump) and very excited to vote! Unfortunately I live in NY so it won‚Äôt matter much.
I was being sarcastic because I‚Äôm no where near qualified for that school. But it does seem that a number of good schools are located in shitty places.
What a relief!
Thanks! Rutgers-Newark is one of the schools I‚Äôm considering going to (got accepted). This is super helpful.

Thanks! I definitely won‚Äôt be making a decision based on safety even though I am worried about it. Turns out that pretty much all the schools I applied to/got into are not all that safe anyway. And yes, sexual assault can happen to anyone!
I‚Äôm half Japanese and half Italian too! But not Sicilian,  Northern Italian actually so quite the opposite lol
It‚Äôs true but I don‚Äôt think people will listen. I mean, this is a sub about applying to college, so the most ambitious people who really value getting into a top school are here.
Lol, that won‚Äôt be hard
I like the alarm thing I think I‚Äôm gonna do that and of course have pepper spray. Good advice!
Cool, I didn‚Äôt know that
Already applied to college so too late for that unfortunately. But you‚Äôre right, hopefully I will have friends who can kick ass if I‚Äôm in a bad situation.
I‚Äôm sorry ik this is sad but that text message though...lmao.
Sure, I mean white passing people are welcome to post here I‚Äôm just saying if they want they can make their own sub.
Oh ok. Also I think r/whitepassingproblems should be a real thing.

Hmm I‚Äôm a little confused. When you say ‚Äúambiguous/white passing‚Äù you make it sound like being light skinned and ethnically ambiguous is the same/similar to the experience of a white passing person. 

When people here claim they are ‚Äúwhite passing‚Äù I‚Äôm thinking like Megan Markle or Rashida Jones or Sean Lennon kind of passing.
That‚Äôs why I keep my hair short. Disgusting men are less likely to pay attention to me.
Omg yesss. The news loves to talk about racism!

Agreed. I understand that white passing people have struggles. I also understand that their struggles are probably overlooked because ‚Äúwhy would looking white be a struggle?‚Äù 

However, I personally look very racially ambiguous. It‚Äôs caused me so much inner turmoil. I‚Äôd give ANYTHING to be a white passing person, even with all the baggage that comes with it. Anything.
Yeah I‚Äôve been wanting to get sweetener and thank u next. Actually never listened to Dangerous Woman though.
She‚Äôs one of my favorite artists!
Agreed!
Yup I love Avril! So cool you have a signed copy. I actually just ordered the best damn thing as well.
Ooof that‚Äôs really difficult I love them all so much. I guess NFR? But honestly I like them pretty much equally.
Yup, I like all the genres
Wow I‚Äôve been doing that for so long I forgot that it‚Äôs not normal.
So weird how you can look full Asian to one person and full white to another. Being mixed is so damn confusing .
You should look at the hapas sub because there‚Äôs a shit ton of pictures there
I feel like your nose and your eyes make you look pretty ambiguous though
I don‚Äôt get it, you look white passing to me.
I know someone already said this but literally the second I saw your picture I thought JHEN√â AIKO and I love her so much lol.
Yup. Applied to the nursing school in NB. The wait really sucks...and waiting this long just to get rejected would suck even more.
Thanks!
200% Asian? Maybe to British people, but you definitely look mixed to me. You look like you could be latina/hispanic.
You kinda look latina/hispanic
Awesome! I love both those shows too
This is so genius! They should do it today with other animated characters. Bojack comes to mind, that would be hilarious.
Wow. What year did you apply/get in?
Thanks so much!!! I have social anxiety so this is super helpful. I wish I spent my middle school/ high school working through my social issues instead of worrying about grades.
Same. I literally can't drink because I have an alcohol intolerance. I heard that some people get offended when people choose not to drink, so I'm a little worried about that.
Yeah...I'm not expecting good news at this point
Sorry I didn't mean to make you worry. But yes, I did hear that they do that. I think it's more common for the early action deadline though.
Okay, thanks

Same! I feel like I'm supposed to talk in like a high pitched voice and act kinda fake (at least that's what I see other people do). And that just feels so unnatural to me and so I end up feeling super awkward.

I still awaiting for one of the schools I applied to, Rutger NB nursing. I heard that Rutgers is will make you wait forever to get a decision only to get a rejection so... I'm not super optimistic about my decision at this point. We should be getting decisions really soon, I'm not sure it'll be this week though.
That's why I made sure that I really liked my safety schools.

I'm a girl. I think it's okay to compliment his ass, but I don't like comments that make it seem like his butt is the most important thing about him. For example, I saw some comments on youtube that were like "I came here for his ass," which I don't like. But in general with Thiem, he's also regarded as a very talented tennis player and a nice guy so it's not really a big deal. But I have seen some cases (unrelated to tennis) where a guy was almost totally reduced to just being a hot guy, and I was totally disgusted.
